Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://rsync.samba.org/ftp/rsync/rsync-3.2.7.tar.gz
ğŸš echo 4e7d9d3f6ed10878c58c5fb724a67dacf4b6aac7340b13e488fb2dc41346f2bb  rsync-3.2.7.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf rsync-3.2.7.tar.gz
ğŸš cd rsync-3.2.7
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/rsync-3.2.7 --disable-lz4 --disable-xxhash --without-included-zlib
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
